hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah said:"The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: 'None of you should perform Ghusl in standing water when he is Junub

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّهْىِ عَنِ اغْتِسَالِ الْجُنُبِ، فِي الْمَاءِ الدَّائِمِ
chapter.eng-name: Prohibition Of One Who Is Junub From Performing Ghusl In Standing Water
